metadata.title: CVE-2022-3058 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Sign-In Flow in Google Chrome prior to 105.0.5195.52allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UIinteractions to potentially exploit heap corruption via crafted UIinteraction.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
